title: Update “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch knob colors (ON white, OFF green)

requirements.text: Update the existing toggle switch labeled “Show Physician Signature Fields” on the Resident Profile page so that only the switch knob (thumb) changes color: white when ON/checked and green when OFF/unchecked. Do not change the label/text colors.

quotes:
1. Show Physician Signature Fields
2. the knob
3. no

acceptanceCriteria: On the Resident Profile page, the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch thumb is green when unchecked/off.
On the Resident Profile page, the “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch thumb is white when checked/on.
The switch track/background behavior is not changed beyond what is necessary to set the thumb color.
The “Show Physician Signature Fields” label text color and styling do not change between on/off states.
Implementation does not require editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose via className and/or global CSS selectors instead).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (they are read-only/immutable).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change toggle label text or add new settings/toggles.
Do not change backend behavior or persistence for physician signature fields.
Do not restyle other switches/toggles elsewhere in the app.
